_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: IW4Admin
author: dominique@wellisch-itservice.de

installation.script:
echo "Installing IW4X Admin" 
apt -y update
dpkg --add-architecture i386
apt -y install curl wget unzip
export HOME=/mnt/server
cd /mnt/server && curl https://api.github.com/repos/RaidMax/IW4M-Admin/releases/latest | grep "browser_download_url.*.zip" | cut -d : -f 2,3 | tr -d \" | wget -qi -
iw4madmin=$(find IW4MAdmin-*)
cd /mnt/server && tar -xvf ${iw4madmin}
cd /mnt/server && rm ${iw4madmin}
